- THE #BERLUTI SUMMER 2020 COLLECTION BY @kris_van_assche -

Introducing the new “Journée” Small Tote Bag in TDM Intenso & Orange.

Now Available In-Store and on the E-Shop.

Photographed by @alasdairmclellan in Rome, Italy - Styling by @mauricionardi -

- THE #BERLUTI SUMMER 2020 COLLECTION BY @kris_van_assche -

The patina stain motif, transmuted from the stained surfaces of the old marble tables on which the Berluti craftsmen in the Ferrara manifattura hand-dye the patina, is applied this season on shirts.

Now Available In-Store and on the E-Shop.

Photographed by @alasdairmclellan in Rome, Italy - Styling by @mauricionardi -

- THE #BERLUTI SUMMER 2020 COLLECTION BY @kris_van_assche -

The “Stellar” Sneaker mixes a pared-down essentialism and a minimal, sculptural shape with a bottier attitude.

Now Available In-Store and on the E-Shop.

Photographed by @alasdairmclellan in Rome, Italy - Styling by @mauricionardi -

- THE #BERLUTI SUMMER 2020 COLLECTION BY @kris_van_assche -

A nail-head surface decoration is introduced in homage of the shoemaking core of Berluti, on the new “Un Jour Mini” Bag.

Now Available In-Store and on the E-Shop.

- THE #BERLUTI SUMMER 2020 COLLECTION BY @kris_van_assche -

A nail-head surface decoration is introduced in homage of the shoemaking core of Berluti, in the all-over embellishment of a Patina Leather Jacket.

Now Available In-Store and on the E-Shop.

- THE #BERLUTI SUMMER 2020 COLLECTION BY @kris_van_assche -

A nail-head surface decoration is introduced in homage of the shoemaking core of Berluti, on the new “Alessandro” Shoes and “Stellar” Sneakers.

Now Available In-Store and on the E-Shop.

- THE #BERLUTI SUMMER 2020 COLLECTION BY @kris_van_assche -

Introducing the new Berluti Trunk in Venezia Leather. Now Available in Special Order.

Photographed by @alasdairmclellan in Rome, Italy - Styling by @mauricionardi -

- THE #BERLUTI SUMMER 2020 COLLECTION BY @kris_van_assche -

Now Available In-Store and on the E-Shop.

Photographed by @alasdairmclellan in Rome, Italy - Styling by @mauricionardi -

- THE #BERLUTI SUMMER 2020 COLLECTION BY @kris_van_assche -

Now Available In-Store and on the E-Shop.

Photographed by @alasdairmclellan in Rome, Italy - Styling by @mauricionardi -

- THE #BERLUTI SUMMER 2020 COLLECTION BY @kris_van_assche -

A nail-head surface decoration is introduced in homage to the shoemaking core of Berluti, in the all-over embellishment of a Patina Leather Jacket.

Now Available In-Store and on the E-Shop.

Photographed by @alasdairmclellan in Rome, Italy - Styling by @mauricionardi -

- THE #BERLUTI SUMMER 2020 COLLECTION BY @kris_van_assche -

Now Available In-Store and on the E-Shop.

Photographed by @alasdairmclellan in Rome, Italy - Styling by @mauricionardi -

- THE #BERLUTI SUMMER 2020 COLLECTION BY @kris_van_assche -

The patina stain motif, transmuted from the stained surfaces of the old marble tables on which the Berluti craftsmen in the Ferrara manifattura hand-dye the patina, is applied this season on shirts.

Now Available In-Store and on the E-Shop.

Photographed by @alasdairmclellan in Rome, Italy - Styling by @mauricionardi -

- THE NEW #BERLUTI PACKAGING -

Introducing the revamped Berluti packaging, made of 100% recyclable paper and available now in our stores worldwide.

Creative Direction by @kris_van_assche and @mmparisdotcom.

- THE NEW #BERLUTI PACKAGING -

Introducing the revamped Berluti packaging, made of 100% recyclable paper and available now in our stores worldwide.

Creative Direction by @kris_van_assche and @mmparisdotcom.

- THE NEW #BERLUTI PACKAGING -

Introducing the revamped Berluti packaging, made of 100% recyclable paper and available now in our stores worldwide.

Creative Direction by @kris_van_assche and @mmparisdotcom.

- THE #BERLUTI SUMMER 2020 COLLECTION BY @kris_van_assche -

Now Available In-Store and on the E-Shop.

Photographed by @alasdairmclellan in Rome, Italy - Styling by @mauricionardi -

- THE #BERLUTI SUMMER 2020 COLLECTION BY @kris_van_assche -

Introducing the “Thunder Scritto” Sunglasses from the Berluti Eyewear Collection made in collaboration with @theliosofficial.

Now Available In-Store and on the E-Shop.

Photographed by @alasdairmclellan in Rome, Italy - Styling by @mauricionardi -

- THE #BERLUTI SUMMER 2020 COLLECTION BY @kris_van_assche -

The “Scritto” signature, a largely indecipherable 19th century manuscript sacred to the Berluti archive, finds new life on leather tailoring evoking the idea of archive pieces that never existed.

Now Available In-Store and on the E-Shop.

Photographed by @alasdairmclellan in Rome, Italy - Styling by @mauricionardi -

- THE #BERLUTI WINTER 2020 SHOW BY @kris_van_assche -

Multi-colored patterns informed by the stained surfaces of the tables on which craftsmen hand-dye the patina are featured on silk shirts and outerwear. Expanding the territory, they are decolourised with a splash technique executed by hand.

Watch the Show on IGTV.

- THE #BERLUTI WINTER 2020 SHOW BY @kris_van_assche -

For Winter 2020, Artistic Director #KrisVanAssche intensifies and abstracts the Maison’s heritage in a free-spirited proposal for our time.

Watch the Show on IGTV.

- THE #BERLUTI WINTER 2020 SHOW BY @kris_van_assche -

For Winter 2020, Artistic Director #KrisVanAssche stages an exaggerated exchange between past and present. The conclusion is eccentric: an electric reaction rooted in our moment in time when dress codes liquify and expressions amplify.

Watch the Show on IGTV.

- THE #BERLUTI WINTER 2020 SHOW BY @kris_van_assche - Look 43 -

Multi-colored patterns informed by the stained surfaces of the tables on which craftsmen hand-dye the patina are featured on silk shirts and outerwear. Expanding the territory, they are decolourised with a splash technique executed by hand.

Photographed by @ronan_gallagher__ - Styling by @mauricionardi -

- THE #BERLUTI WINTER 2020 SHOW BY @kris_van_assche - Look 09 -

A hand-splashed hooded calf leather jacket features an exaggerated and deconstructed houndstooth pattern.

Photographed by @ronan_gallagher__ - Styling by @mauricionardi -

- THE #BERLUTI WINTER 2020 SHOW BY @kris_van_assche - Look 09 -

The new SIGNATURE Canvas, used on a watch box, evokes the idea of a heritage logo that never existed.

Photographed by @ronan_gallagher__ - Styling by @mauricionardi -

- THE #BERLUTI WINTER 2020 SHOW BY @kris_van_assche -

Imagining what the Maison’s century old-archives - entrenched in expert shoemaking - would look like had they encompassed tailoring, Artistic Director #KrisVanAssche stages an exaggerated exchange between past and present.

Video Direction by @nicolas_santos - Styling by @mauricionardi -
